message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand that $120 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $160. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $140?
I'm still a bit above my target, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $155. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you meet me at $145?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go below $160. I can offer it to you for $152. It's a final compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you meet me at $148?
I'm not willing to go below $150, Bob. This is my final offer. I can offer it to you for $150. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
